name: Vegan Feta Cheese
description: This vegan feta cheese is the perfect addition to Mediterranean salads or pasta dishes. It's super easy to make, very versatile, and so delicious. And you need only 5 minutes of active preparation time!

recipeInstructions.text: Start by pressing your tofu to remove the excess water, so it will hold its shape better. Remove the tofu from the packaging. Place it in a tofu press and let it press for about 30 minutes. Alternatively you could also press your tofu without a tofu press. Wrap it with a clean dishtowel. Place it on a plate, cover it with a baking sheet, and then place something heavy on top. I usually use a stack of cookbooks. Leave it like this for 30 minutes. You could also skip this step if you want.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the marinade. Place all ingredients in a bowl or a container with a lid and stir until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the marinade. Place all ingredients in a bowl or a container with a lid and stir until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the tofu cubes and carefully stir, so all tofu cubes are covered with the marinade.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the tofu cubes and carefully stir, so all tofu cubes are covered with the marinade.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover with the lid and leave in the fridge overnight to marinate.

recipeInstructions.text: Drain and get rid of the excess marinade. Use the tofu for salads or pasta recipes.
